FuncDef: The collect diagnostic information command collects the system log information. The collect diagnostic information command collects the system log information.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo:
You can run this command to save the system log information to the current log directory.
When a fault occurs in the system, you can run this command and locate the fault based on the saved log information.
